title: Why not create a brand new feature called "Achievement" under the player profile?
body: It can be like: The number of minions you have killed in the summoner rift, the total number of enemy you have slayed in the rift, the total amount of gold you have earned, the total number of tower you have took during the past few years of each player in the rift, but i know that this might cost a lot of time to finish this feature but i hope riot can make this feature into our great client in the future, and this will be fun to check and think, what do you guys think, welcome to comment down below.
